How we handle mental illness can mean life or death.

I will never understand the unnecessary loss of life.

Jamal was in custody. He was alone in a jail cell. He was not a threat to anyone in that moment.

No one deserves the death penalty for missing a bond hearing or for being a mental health patient.

I’m heartbroken, angry, and confused. Our community is feeling tremendous pain. I just do not understand how this could happen - again.

1346840968931266561.text: Over the course of the last several days, I’ve heard from countless people in the Lowcountry regarding the vote to certify the #ElectoralCollege. Like many of you, I’m gravely concerned about allegations of voter fraud in multiple states & believe this MUST be investigated. (1/7)

1346830798171877377.text: On Sunday I swore an oath to the Constitution. I promised to take that oath seriously. Period. I support the President, but the Constitution is clear: Congress may ONLY select new electors ONLY if states send new electors. More @postandcourier: https://t.co/mIG89rq3fO
